data.scheme_name: MSME Competitive  (Lean) Scheme - Female - All Categories - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 95% reimbursement on implementation cost of consultant fees for the MSMEs.
data.eligibility: All MSMEs registered with the UDYAM registration portal (of the MoMSME) will be eligible to participate in MSME Competitive (Lean) Scheme and avail related benefits/incentives.
data.conditions:
1. Every MSME will have to take “Lean Pledge” before submitting its application. 
  2. Every MSME will have to submit undertaking. 
  3. For Intermediate and Advanced level, the eligible MSMEs will have to form a Group of Enterprises (GoE) which will comprise at least 4 and up to 10 MSMEs.
data.beneficiaries: All MSMEs registered with the UDYAM registration portal (of the MoMSME) will be eligible to participate in MSME Competitive (Lean) Scheme and can avail related benefits/incentives.
data.prerequisites:
1. Every MSME will have to take “Lean Pledge” before submitting its application. 
  2. Every MSME will have to submit undertaking. 
  3. For Intermediate and Advanced level, the eligible MSMEs will have to form a Group of Enterprises (GoE) which will comprise at least 4 and up to 10 MSMEs.
data.nodal_agency: Quality Council of India (QCI)/National Productivity Council (NPC)
data.context: This scheme is introduced for extensive drive and continuous effort on the part of Ministry of MSME for enhancing the competitiveness of MSME Sectors through implementation of Lean Tools and Techniques.
data.objective: The main objective is to implement the MSME Competitive (Lean) Scheme for MSMEs to enhance their productivity, efficiency, and competitiveness by reduction of wastages in processes, inventory management, space management, energy consumption, etc.
data.description:
Scheme provides reimbursement on implementation cost of consultant fees for the MSMEs. 

  • For Basic Level : Free of cost For Intermediate Level: Beneficiary Contribution : 10% of Total Cost  Implementation i.e., up to ₹ 12,000 + Taxes per unit (Max.) 
  • Government contribution : MSME unit will be entitled for up to ₹ 1,08,000 (max.) towards the Implementation cost (Taxes Extra). 
  • Additional benefit : Additional 5% GOI contribution for MSMEs which are part of  Woman MSMEs. 
  • For Advanced Level : Beneficiary Contribution : 10% of Total Cost of Implementation i.e., up to ₹24,000 + Taxes per unit (Max.) 
  • Government  Contribution : MSME unit will be entitled for up to ₹ 2,16,000 (max.) towards the Implementation cost (Taxes Extra) Additional benefit : a) Additional 5% GOI contribution for MSMEs which are part of  Woman MSMEs.
data.funding_facilitator: Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprise
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives after the approval of concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
MSME Competitive (Lean) Scheme can be attained in three Levels after registering and taking the Lean Pledge: 

  • Level 1 : Basic Self-paced learning with the help of online Module The validity of the certificate is for a period of 03 years. 
  • Level 2 : Intermediate Duration of course will be 6 months which includes Minimum onsite holding of 12 -14-man days per unit of GoE. The validity of the certificate is for a period of 03 years. 
  • Level 3 : Advanced Duration of this course is 12 months which includes Minimum onsite holding of 24–26-man days per unit of GoE. The validity of the certificate is for a period of 03 years.
data.checklist_info_a:
1.) Udyam Registration Certificate
2.) KYC Documents
3.) Undertaking along with application
5.) Loan Pledge
data.checklist_info_d:

data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industry - All Locations - All Entities - MSME
data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
